Introductory statement Mario Draghi to the press conference https://t.co/3neh4JYEIa
Draghi: Our mandate is neither growth nor employment but price stability
Draghi: Changing the inflation objective is not credible
Draghi: All major central banks aim at 2 percent inflation, the reasons are still valid, especially for the euro area
Draghi: The reaction of wages to economic developments has changed since the financial crisis but we expect it to return to normal
Draghi: The Governing Council has proven that it can use all flexibility to reach its target
Draghi: The ECB will stay in the market for a long time
Draghi: You have reflation when the price level recovers after falling below the trend line.
Draghi: We need to be persistent, patient and prudent
Draghi: Implementation of structural reforms needs to be substantially stepped up
Draghi: Pass-through of our monetary policy measures is supporting domestic demand
Draghi: A very substantial degree of monetary accommodation is still needed for underlying inflation pressures to build up
Draghi: Underlying inflation remains overall at subdued levels
Draghi: Headline inflation is dampened by the weakness in energy prices
Draghi: Risks to the growth outlook are broadly balanced
Mario Draghi: Incoming information confirms a continued strengthening of economic expansion in the euro area
